original_text: My friends, I know that people are causing you to have bad trouble. It is like a fire that is burning you. Do not be surprised about that. These things are happening to you, to show whether you really trust God. Do not think that something strange is happening to you.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 너희를 연단하려고 오는 불 시험을 이상한 일 당하는 것 같이 이상히 여기지 말고

sentences.original_text: I know that people are causing you to have bad trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너희에게 고통을 주고 있다는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: It is like a fire that is burning you
Do not be surprised about that
These things are happening to you
to show whether you really trust God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 정말로 하나님을 신뢰하는지 보여주기 위함이다

sentences.original_text: Do not think that something strange is happening to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 이상한 일이 일어난다고 생각하지 말라
